learning.buildSoftware: How to build software with AI
learning.aiTools: Working with AI tools (GitHub Copilot, Cursor, ChatGPT)
learning.apiIntegration: API integration and working with data

skills.buildSoftware: How to build software with AI

course.specializationText1: This specialization is designed for beginners who want to build software using AI—no coding experience required. You'll learn the fundamentals of vibe coding and how to use tools like GitHub Copilot, Cursor, and ChatGPT to turn your ideas into real, working apps.
course.specializationText2: Whether you're a marketer, designer, accountant, or creative professional, this course will teach you how to leverage AI to create software solutions faster and smarter.
course.specializationText3: The final course introduces core technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a focus on high-level understanding. The skills gained will enable you to confidently build apps using vibe coding IDE or professional tools like Windsurf, Cline, or Claude Code.
course.specializationText4: You'll learn to create full-featured web applications, understanding core programming concepts and leveraging AI capabilities to accelerate development.

kyc.title: KYC Features
kyc.subtitle: Unified identity and document components designed to clear platform KYC/AML on the first submission.

features.feature1: We deliver glare-free, spec-perfect scans of Passports, National IDs, and Driver's licenses with crisp MRZ/QR and clearly legible key fields
features.feature2: Utility bills, Bank statements, and Tax letters styled to platform rules—correct issuer, dates, and address, easy to review at a glance.
features.feature3: Safe EXIF profiles (sanitized or custom), portal-ready JPEG/PNG/PDF presets, and tight size control for smooth uploads
features.feature4: ID-matched portraits in neutral light, plus optional blink/turn micro-sequences that satisfy liveness prompts without rework.

advantages.title:
Review-Ready 
Advantages
advantages.item1: First-Pass Approval Focus — Assets tuned to pass review on the first submission.
advantages.item2: Data Consistency — names, DoB, numbers, and expiry aligned across every asset.
advantages.item3: 24h SLA with Refund — deadline guarantee for urgent cases.
